#summary How to install Nexus
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

[http://nexus.sonatype.org/ Nexus] is Maven Repository Manager.

= Prerequisites =

Configured repository (see [HowTo]).

= Installation =

If you use cave:
{{{
cave resolve -x dev-java/nexus-oss-bin
}}}

Or using emerge:
{{{
emerge -av dev-java/nexus-oss-bin
}}}

The only thing left to do is to start Nexus:
{{{
/etc/init.d/nexus start
}}}

And, optionally, add it to start at boot:
{{{
rc-update add nexus default
}}}
